title: Force on piston during two processes

content.question: Which of the following claims correctly describes the average force the gas exerts on the piston as the gas is taken through one of the processes?

choices.label: The average force increases during process 1 because the volume of the gas decreases.
The average force decreases during process 1 because the temperature decreases.
The average force increases during process 2 because the pressure of the gas increases.
The average force remains the same during process 2 because the volume of the gas does not change.

content.answer: The average force increases during process 2 because the pressure of the gas increases.

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
